about_the_game: PURESHKA SOUND ALBUM is a set made up of unique game tracks made in the style of the techno era of the world CYBER EMOJI TALE, listening to which you can already remember unforgettable battles from the game, touching exciting stories that grab the soul and other mental adventures. An album that pretends to be everything and nothing at the same time, you have definitely never heard this!

An album that pretends to be everything and nothing at the same time, you have definitely never heard this!
